item.title: Miss Silabsoft Java for complete noobs like me (lesson 2)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I know very little about java but theirs alot of you that know alot less! you know who you are handing around in the private server area trying to run a private server without knowing what a void is so im gonna give you some quick lessons on everything i know so far! probly 1 lesson a day today we are going to make just a example.java follow my lead and if you have any problems your fired!(i owe trump .25 million for saying that) If you looking to learn quickly and not interested in the simpilton stuff im gonna be teaching check out xsignals post

Lesson 1
first open up notepad because i dont use some fancy java editor!

put this in it:

public class example {
}

save it as example.java then try to compile it if it compiles congratz you just made your first class we will be expanding on this class later when i have time to write more so keep it saved somewhere

Lesson 2: Making our first void

add this code inbetween our first brackets if you dont remember what they are they are these things "{" "}"

 public void Test{
}

save it and try to compile if you did it right you now have your first void if you did it wrong go away!

Read full topic
item.source: Miss Silabsoft Java for complete noobs like me (lesson 2)
